price: Nhyira ne wo Wura Nyankopͻn din, Ɔno na Kεseyε ne Animuonyam yε Ne dea.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
